analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0xf51ba2d21a9edd8ec082444a1d4a8eefe5f986db.sol:
	Contract EUROCASH has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xf51ba2d21a9edd8ec082444a1d4a8eefe5f986db.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0xf51ba2d21a9edd8ec082444a1d4a8eefe5f986db.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/15/0xf51ba2d21a9edd8ec082444a1d4a8eefe5f986db.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0xf51ba2d21a9edd8ec082444a1d4a8eefe5f986db.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
